OOC: Uhhh... what does this have to do with WindRider
and Battera? Just wondering! :)
--- JP3884@... wrote:
>     Just to let you all know, I now control Megatron
> and Waspinator.
> 
>     Black Aracnia enters the room with Decadel,
> Quickstrike, and Darkmouse. 
> She went right up to the weak fembot and began to
> look at her vital signs.
>     "Hm, this is strange. Im going to check Hell
> Beast's archives about the 
> effects this might have on you. Just rest and relax.
> I can give you something 
> for the pain if you need it, although a little pain
> might do you good."
> 
>     Megatron glared his crimsom eyes at Kitkat and
> Rowdy Wolf. He pushed his 
> large body through the foliage and shrubs into the
> clearing with the two bots.
>     "Ah, my loyal troops. What are you discussing?"
> He said in a voice and 
> tone that only could be his. Yes.
>
